snippet: Jeremy Jordan, a Tony Award nominee for his lead role in "Newsies the Musical," will join "Smash" in Season 2 as a character described as "Sexy, charismatic, musically gifted, but also self-destructive and remote."
abstract: Jeremy Jordan, a Tony Award nominee for his lead role in "Newsies the Musical," will join "Smash" in Season 2 as a character described as "Sexy, charismatic, musically gifted, but also self-destructive and remote."

headline.main: Jeremy Jordan Added to Cast of NBC's 'Smash'
headline.print_headline: Jeremy Jordan Is Added to Cast of ‘Smash’
